dct_description_sm: Issued in his: Geografia Universale espost a nei differenti metodi .. .dal P. Buffier ... quarta edizione ... Appresso Francesco Pitteri. -- In Venezia, MDCCXLVII (1747).
In Italian. With title: MAPPAMONDO “Pag. 7” (top left), faint “p. 6” (top right). California unlabeled. No internally labeled points, only the continents are named.
California with a rounded northern coast.
